docs.lead_paragraph: Two years after Minnesota officials forbade drug makers to give doctors more than $50 worth of food or other gifts per year, drug company sales representatives there are having a far harder time marketing to doctors.

headline.main: Minnesota Limit on Gifts to Doctors May Catch On
headline.sub: A Rule Change Limits Access to Doctors;
headline.print_headline: Minnesota Limit on Gifts To Doctors May Catch On

docs.snippet: Two years after Minnesota officials forbade drug makers to give doctors more than $50 worth of food or other gifts per year, drug company sales representatives there are having a far harder time marketing to doctors.

docs.lead_paragraph: Coronary CT scans may offer valuable insight for those looking to find the cause of their high cholesterol. But are there risks?

headline.main: CT Scans of the Heart Come With Trade-Offs
headline.print_headline: CT Scans of the Heart Come With Trade offs

docs.snippet: Coronary CT scans may offer valuable insight for those looking to find the cause of their high cholesterol. But are there risks?
